section.title: 准备：禁用SELinux

note.para: 如果你的系统使用了SELinux，你需要禁用它，否则OTRS无法正常工作。

section.para:
下面是如何在RHEL/CentOS/Fedora中禁用SELinux：
在文件/etc/selinux/config中配置SELINUX=disabled：
# This file controls the state of SELinux on the system. # SELINUX= can take one of these three values: # enforcing - SELinux security policy is enforced. # permissive - SELinux prints warnings instead of enforcing. # disabled - No SELinux policy is loaded. SELINUX=disabled # SELINUXTYPE= can take one of these two values: # targeted - Targeted processes are protected, # mls - Multi Level Security protection. SELINUXTYPE=targeted
重启系统。重启后确认命令getenforce返回为Disabled：
root> getenforce Disabled

section.title: Step 1: Unpack and Install the Application
section.para: Unpack the source archive (for example, using tar) into the directory /opt, and rename the directory from otrs-x.x.x to otrs (see Script below).

para.screen: root> tar xzf /tmp/otrs-x.x.x.tar.gz root> mv otrs-x.x.x /opt/otrs

section.title: Step 2: Install Additional Programs and Perl Modules
section.para: Use the following script to get an overview of all installed and required CPAN modules and other external dependencies.

para.screen: root> perl /opt/otrs/bin/otrs.CheckEnvironment.pl Checking for Perl Modules: o Archive::Tar.....................ok (v1.90) o Archive::Zip.....................ok (v1.37) o Crypt::Eksblowfish::Bcrypt.......ok (v0.009) ...

note.para: 请注意：OTRS需要一个安装了所有核心模块（如version）、能工作的Perl。这些模块不在脚本的检查范围，在某些系统上（如RHEL）默认没有安装这些核心模块，你可能需要安装一个perl-core软件包。

section.para: OTRS requires a supported stable version of Node.js to be installed. Please refer to the Node.js installation instructions.

section.title: Step 3: Create the OTRS User
section.para: Create a dedicated user for OTRS:

section.title: Step 4: Activate the Default Config File
section.para: There is one OTRS config file bundled in $OTRS_HOME/Kernel/Config.pm.dist. You must activate it by copying it without the ".dist" filename extension.

section.title: Step 5: Configure the Apache Web Server
section.para: OTRS comes with an own built-in web server that is used behind apache as a reverse proxy (or any other reverse proxy server). A few apache modules are needed for correct operation: proxy_module, proxy_http_module and proxy_wstunnel_module.

para.screen:
# On some systems like Debian and SuSE, these modules need to be specifically enabled:
root> a2enmod proxy root> a2enmod proxy_http root> a2enmod proxy_wstunnel

section.para: 大部分的Apache安装都会包括一个conf.d目录。在Linux系统中这个目录一般在/etc/apache或/etc/apache2目录下。以root用户登录，进入conf.d目录，并在Apache配置目录创建一个到/opt/otrs/scripts/apache2-httpd.include.conf的软链接zzz_otrs.conf（确保载入其它配置之后再载入OTRS配置）。
现在你可以重启WEB服务器来载入新的配置设置了。在大多数系统你可以用systemctl restart apache2.service命令来重启Apache。

section.title: Step 6: Set File Permissions
section.para: 请以root用户身份执行以下命令，以设置OTRS的文件和目录权限。 它将尝试检测你的安装所需的正确的用户和组设置。

section.title: Step 7: Setup the Database
section.para: The following steps need to be taken to setup the database for OTRS properly:

listitem.para: Create a dedicated database user and database.
Configure the database connection in Kernel/Config.pm.

note.para: 请注意，OTRS需要utf8作为数据库存储编码。
下面的推荐配置设置是针对MySQL的。请添加下列行到文件 /etc/my.cnf 的[mysqld]部分：

para.screen:
# # Run these commands as "postgres" user: # sudo su - postgres
# Create database createdb --encoding=utf8 --owner=otrs otrs
# Create database user echo "create user otrs password 'choose-your-password';" | psql
# # Run these commands on the shell as 'otrs' user. #
# Create schema and insert data. export PGPASSWORD=some-pass psql otrs otrs -h localhost < /opt/otrs/scripts/database/otrs-schema.postgresql.sql psql otrs otrs -h localhost < /opt/otrs/scripts/database/otrs-initial_insert.postgresql.sql psql otrs otrs -h localhost < /opt/otrs/scripts/database/otrs-schema-post.postgresql.sql
# Configure database settings in Kernel/Config.pm $Self->{DatabaseHost} = '127.0.0.1'; $Self->{Database} = 'otrs'; $Self->{DatabaseUser} = 'otrs'; $Self->{DatabasePw} = 'choose-your-password'; $Self->{DatabaseDSN} = "DBI:Pg:dbname=$Self->{Database};host=$Self->{DatabaseHost};";

section.title: Finishing the Database Setup
section.para: To verify your database setup, run the following command (as otrs user):

para.screen: otrs> /opt/otrs/bin/otrs.Console.pl Maint::Database::Check Trying to connect to database 'DBI:Pg:dbname=otrs;host=localhost' with user 'otrs'... Connection successful.

note.para: For security reasons, please change the default password root of the admin user root@localhost.

para.screen: otrs> /opt/otrs/bin/otrs.Console.pl Admin::User::SetPassword root@localhost Generated password 'rtB98S55kuc9'. Successfully set password for user 'root@localhost'.

section.title: Step 8: Setup Elasticsearch Cluster
section.para: OTRS requires an active cluster of Elasticsearch 6.0 or higher. The easiest way is to setup Elasticsearch on the same host as OTRS and binding it to its default port. With that, no further configuration in OTRS is needed.
Additionally, OTRS requires plugins to be installed into Elasticsearch:

para.screen: # Install required plugins for elasticsearch. root> /usr/share/elasticsearch/bin/elasticsearch-plugin install --batch ingest-attachment root> /usr/share/elasticsearch/bin/elasticsearch-plugin install --batch analysis-icu

section.para:
To verify the Elasticsearch installation, you can use the following command:
otrs> /opt/otrs/bin/otrs.Console.pl Maint::DocumentSearch::Check Trying to connect to cluster... Connection successful.

section.title: Step 9: Start the OTRS Daemon and Web Server
section.para: The new OTRS daemon is responsible for handling any asynchronous and recurring tasks in OTRS. The built-in OTRS web server process handles the web requests handed over from Apache. Both processes must be started from the otrs user.

section.title: Step 10: First Login
section.para: Now you are ready to login to your system at http://localhost/otrs/index.pl as user root@localhost with the password that was generated (see above).

section.title: Step 11: Setup Cron Jobs
section.para: OTRS自带了两个不同的cron文件：/opt/otrs/var/cron/*.dist，它们的目的是确保OTRS守护正常运行。你需要将它们复制为不带.dist扩展名的文件名来激活它们。

para.screen: otrs> cd /opt/otrs/var/cron otrs> for foo in *.dist; do cp $foo `basename $foo .dist`; done

section.para: 要在系统中安排这些cron任务，你可以使用otrs运行脚本文件Cron.sh。

para.screen:
otrs> /opt/otrs/bin/Cron.sh start
# Stopping the cron jobs is also possible (useful for maintenance): otrs> /opt/otrs/bin/Cron.sh stop

section.para: 通过本步骤，完成了系统的基本配置。

section.title: Step 12: Setup Bash Autocompletion (optional)
section.para: 所有的常规OTRS命令操作现在都通过OTRS控制台接口 bin/otrs.Console.pl执行。它提供bash的自动补齐功能，在查找正确的命令和选项时更容易些。
你可以安装软件包bash-completion来激活bash的自动补齐功能。它能为otrs用户自动检测到并载入文件/opt/otrs/.bash_completion。
重启shell后，你可以在输入bin/otrs.Console.pl后按TAB键，就会显示所有可用的命令。如果你键入了命令的部分字符，按TAB键会列出所有匹配这些字符的命令。在输入完整的命令后，按TAB键会列出所有可用的选项和参数。
